M14/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX




      22140627

PUNJABI A: LITERATURE – STANDARD LEVEL – PAPER 1
PANJABI A : Littérature – NIVEAU MOYEN – ÉPREUVE 1
PUNJABI A: LITERATURA – NIVEL MEDIO – PRUEBA 1

Friday 9 May 2014 (morning)
Vendredi 9 mai 2014 (matin)
Viernes 9 de mayo de 2014 (mañana)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES
 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a guided literary analysis on one passage only. In your answer you must address both
  of the guiding questions provided.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS
 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez une analyse littéraire dirigée d’un seul des passages. Les deux questions d’orientation
  fournies doivent être traitées dans votre réponse.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [20 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS
 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un análisis literario guiado sobre un solo pasaje. Debe abordar las dos preguntas de
  orientación en su respuesta.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].




2214-0627                                                                                   4 pages/páginas

                                                       –2–                  M14/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

isrP iz<k bNw wa inrweiSq saihqk ivSleSx ilKo . ]apxe [u>qr iv<c quha¥ inrweSn krwe iw<qe hoze wohA
svalA bare ZrUr ilKxa cahIwa hE .

1.

            mA ne ]je ikNne hI ca] pUre krne hn . ]ADxA gu]ADxA ¥ lohfI wa iq[uhar iwKa[uxa hE . hr ]azI
            gzI ¥ hu<b ke w<sxa hE … r<je pu<je Gr wI ]E, pElHA bQera kuC il]AwE, hux bQera kuC il]azI ]E, roZ hI
            il]a[UgI, WI wa wex qA sarI [umr nhIM mu<kwa . mA ¥ ca] hE, hr ]azI gzI we mUNhoM izho ijhI]A g<lA
            suxn wa … qerI nUNh BagA valI ]E jsbNq kure, WrqI nmskair]a kr wohIM belIM, iksmqA nal izho
      5     ijhe sak jufwe ]E, moqI puNn kIqe ve]E qere ipCle jnm we .

            kwe mA we ca] Gera G<q ke mere wu]ale GuNm rhe huNwe qe kwe rUp wI]A ba-muS<kq kEw wI]A g<lA .
            ]KIr sarI]A g<lA wa ivSleSx krke iz<k sp<St is<te qe phuNcwa hA . pr is<WI g<l ]aK ke mA wa iwl
            qofn ¥ jI nhIM krwa . rUp ¥ izk<lI ipNd na C<dx wa PEsla mEM pihlA hI kr cu<ik]a hA . pr iz<t
            vAg izh PEsla mA we m<Qe iv<c nhIM mair]a ja skwa . wuibwa iv<c Ps ig]a hA . ]KIr iz<k iv[uMq
     10     mere iwmag iv<c ]a[uMwI hE . kuJ smA hor g<l ¥ tail]a ja skwa hE . mA ¥ ic<TI ilKwa hA .

            “siqkaryog maqa jI, qusIM rUp ¥ ipNd C<d jax bare iliK]a hE pr quha¥ kuJ iwn hor rUp qoM ibnA
            rihxa pvega ik[uMik mEM rUp we lsx wa [upreSn krva[ux bare soc irha hA . qusIM vI kzI varI [uswe
            lsx wI g<l kIqI hE . [upreSn krva[ux lzI izh mOsm vWI]a w<is]a ig]a hE . [upreSn qoM ip<CoM mEM
            rUp ¥ ipNd il]avAga . ]sIM ws vIh iwn rhAge . izs kNm lzI je quhadI lof pzI qA pqa iw]Aga .”

     15     qe mEM ]gle iwn iz<k mhIne wI Cu<tI lE ke rUp kol phuNc jAwa hA . raijNwra hspqal iv<c waKl krva
            iwNwa hA . [upreSn rahIM [us we lsx wa kala mas lah iw<qa jAwa hE . [us QA qe [us we p<t wa mas
            k<t ke plasitk srjrI rahIM lga iw<qa jAwa hE . rUp ¥ wUhre ZKm wI pIf qoM bca[ux lzI mEM ]apxa
            mas wex wI peSkS krwa hA qA daktr h<s pEMwa hE . rUp ¥ wo ZkmA wI qklIP huNwI hE pr cIsA mere
            iwl iv<c pEMwI]A hn . [uswI sarI pIf mEM dIk la ke pI jaxa cahuNwa hA . [uswa wrw Gta[ux wI hr
     20     sNBv koiSS krwa hA .

            ]apxe h<QA nal [us ¥ jUs ipla[uMwa hA . mOka imlx qe [uswa isr Gu<twa hA . ]apxa izmej [us
            we mn iv<c muf sQapq krn wa izh mOka mE¥ msA imil]a hE . ipNd rih ke [us we ]Nwr bxe sare
            ]xsuKaveM pRBav Wo wexa cahuNwa hA . ]apxe ]Nwr pEwa hoze ]praWIpuxe we ]ihsas ¥ imta wexa
            cahuNwahA . [uswI]a ]<KA iv<c ]apxa Koiz]a hoiz]a msIhapn, wevqapn muf kaizm krna cahuNwa hA .
     25     izs [upreSn ne sade ]NwrlI]A ikNnI]A hI wUrI]A Kqm kr iw<qI]A hn .

            ZKm Br jAwe hn, p<tI]A Ku<lH jAwI]a hn . tAke k<t iw<qe jAwe hn . [upreSn ip<CoM pihlI var jw rUp
            ]apxa mUNh SISe iv<c weKwI hE qA [uswI]A g<lHA qe iz<kwm gulal iCfik]a jAwa hE . [uswe sahmxe
            KfHa mEM [uswe ichre wa pRBav pfH irha hA . [uswI]A ]<KA ]noKI KuSI nal cmk [uTwI]A hn .
            KuSI [us qoM sABI nhIM jAwI, B<jke [uh mE¥ j<PI pa lEMwI hE .

     30     “ip>qI ! mEM bhuq KuS ]A ip<qI !” kihNwI hozI sare Zor nal mE¥ cuNm lEMwI hE . ]<j kaPI wer ba]w pihlI
            var [us ne mE¥ ]apxa smJ ke bulaiz]a hE . rUp ¥ wobara ij<qx wI pRapqI we ]ihsas iv<coM pEwa hozI
            iqRpqI BrI KuSI nal mera iwl n<ko n<k Br jAwa hE .

                                                                        izNwr isNG KamoS, irSiq]A we rNg (1978)

2214-0627

      (a)   varqa we ivSe vsqU ]qe paqrA we irSiq]A bare bare qusIM kI smJwe ho ?

      (b)   varqa iv<c vrqI gzI bolI ]qe SbwavlI izs we mu<K paqr we mn wI siQqI wI ]slI]q peS
            krn iv<c ikveM mww krwe hn ?




2214-0627                                                  Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                                                   –4–                    M14/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

2.

                                             ]je hozI nhIM wer

                          ]a ja game, ]a ja rame, ]a ja lame BazI
                          mn mere iv<c ikse soc ne bfI icqvzI lazI
                          hOlI hOlI wes ‘coM yaro, ru<K je sare mu<k javxge
                          msUm izh pNCI Bole Bale, ik<Qe Gr bnavxge .

                      5   nZroM {hle huNwe ja rhe, kuwrq we ]nmol nZare
                          [u>dwe sn jo JuNd bxa ke, ik<Wr gze [uh qoqe sare
                          ]smanI h<Q la[ux valI]A, iz<lHA saQoM wUr ne hozI]A
                          pRwUSx valI sUzI ]<ge, hOlI hOlI jax prozI]A .

                          Gu<gI]A wI hux gutkUN, na kNnIM sade pEMwI ze
                     10   ru<s gzI lgwI nal ]sA we, wUr ikqe [uh rihNwI ze
                          jNglI kbUqr mare dr we, ikWre [udarI mar gze
                          ]Nbr ¥ sI ijnHA ne ij<iq]a, lgwE [uh vI har gze .

                          BaveM in<ke bal ]sIM hA, krIze karname kozI v<de
                          QA QA ru<K lga ke ]apA, pu<t su<tIze pRwUSx we kNde
                     15   suhavI “koml” Wrq je ho[U, muf ru<se pNKerU ]avxge
                          msUm izh pNCI Bole Bale, Per qoM ]alHxe pavxge .

                                                                        koml isNG, cIco cIc gnHerI]A (2001)


      (a)   izs kivqa iv<c peS kIqe vrqman smeM wa vrxn krwe hoze it<pxI kro ]qe Biv<K bare kI klpna
            kIqI gzI hE ?

      (b)   kivqa ilKx wI kla we ikhfe gux kvI we sunehe ¥ pRBavSalI bna[ux iv<c yogwan pa[uMwe hn ?
